mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_reward_record (referee_id, referee_name, user_id, user_name, user_identity, trade_id, trade_time, trade_amount, invest_period, reward_amount, status) VALUES(#{referee_id},#{referee_name},#{user_id},#{user_name},#{user_identity},#{trade_id},NOW(),#{trade_amount},#{invest_period} ,#{reward_amount},#{status});
mapper.select: select sum(reward_amount) from t_reward_record WHERE referee_id = #{referee} and user_id=#{userId}
